description: 閱讀文學及文化文本，欣賞並了解英語文多變的風貌與魅力；並透過英文聽說讀寫練習，認識與討論文學和文化議題。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
Sophomore English Fall 2018

Syllabus

**_THIS COURSE WILL BE TAUGHT IN ENGLISH._**

Instructor: Chingshun J. Sheu 許景順 ([cjsheu@ntnu.edu.tw](mailto:cjsheu@ntnu.edu.tw))

Objectives: Students will gain an appreciation for literature in English and Western cultural concerns, broaden related contextual knowledge, and improve their English comprehension and critical thinking.

Grading:        45% Essays

                        40% Final exam

                        15% Weekly quiz

Students should read the assigned texts **_before class_** each week and answer the online weekly quiz. During class, students will divide into groups to discuss questions from the instructor. They will then share their answers with the class.

Essays will help students think about the merits and demerits of a text. Students will form an evaluative argument and provide textual evidence.
